name: twilio
title: Twilio
description: Twilio API integration for SMS messaging, voice calls, and phone number management

operations.name: send_sms
operations.title: Send SMS
operations.description: Send an SMS message via Twilio

to.description: Recipient phone number in E.164 format (e.g. +15551234567)

from.description: Twilio phone number to send from in E.164 format (e.g. +15559876543)

body.description: Text content of the SMS message

operations.name: list_messages
operations.title: List Messages
operations.description: List SMS messages with optional filters

to.description: Filter by recipient phone number in E.164 format

from.description: Filter by sender phone number in E.164 format

pageSize.description: Number of messages per page (max 1000, default 50)

operations.name: get_message
operations.title: Get Message
operations.description: Get details of a specific SMS message by SID

operations.name: list_calls
operations.title: List Calls
operations.description: List voice calls with optional filters

to.description: Filter by recipient phone number in E.164 format

from.description: Filter by caller phone number in E.164 format

status.description: Filter by call status: queued, ringing, in-progress, completed, busy, failed, no-answer, canceled

pageSize.description: Number of calls per page (max 1000, default 50)

operations.name: make_call
operations.title: Make Call
operations.description: Initiate an outbound voice call via Twilio

to.description: Recipient phone number in E.164 format (e.g. +15551234567)

from.description: Twilio phone number to call from in E.164 format

url.description: TwiML URL containing instructions for the call

method.description: HTTP method for the TwiML URL (GET or POST, default POST)

operations.name: list_phone_numbers
operations.title: List Phone Numbers
operations.description: List incoming phone numbers owned by the Twilio account

pageSize.description: Number of phone numbers per page (max 1000, default 50)
